DataElement.preferredName: Baseline Surgical Procedure Orthopedics Lower Extremity Performed Lower Extremity Orthopedics Anatomic Site
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The names and location of the limb that is composed of the hip, thigh, leg and foot where surgery broadly concerned with the skeletal system (bones and joints) performed.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Baseline Surgical Procedure Orthopedics Lower Extremity Performed
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to the baseline surgical procedure performed on the skeletal system (bones and joints) of the limb that is composed of the hip, thigh, leg and foot.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Baseline; an imaginary standard by which things are measured or compared.:A diagnostic or treatment procedure performed by manual and/or instrumental means, often involving an incision and the removal or replacement of a diseased organ or tissue; of or relating to or involving or used in surgery or requiring or amenable to treatment by surgery.

Concepts.definition: A starting point to which things may be compared.

A diagnostic or treatment procedure performed by manual and/or instrumental means, often involving an incision and the removal or replacement of a diseased organ or tissue; of or relating to or involving or used in surgery or requiring or amenable to treatment by surgery.

Property.preferredDefinition: Orthopedics is the branch of surgery broadly concerned with the skeletal system (bones and joints). (from On-line Medical Dictionary):Definition not available.:Executed and carried through to completion.

Concepts.definition: The branch of surgery broadly concerned with the skeletal system (bones and joints).
The limb that is composed of the hip, thigh, leg and foot.
Executed and carried through to completion.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Tests, examinations, evaluations used to determine a subject's status or response to intervention.
ConceptualDomain.changeDescription: Created initially to support CCR value domain for CTMS.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The names and location of the limb that is composed of the hip, thigh, leg and foot where surgery broadly concerned with the skeletal system (bones and joints) performed.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned.

Concepts.definition: Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 1/25/23 added alt name for ticket number CADSR0001948 for CCTG cjl.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Being or located on or directed toward the side of the body to the east when facing north.: The terminal part of the lower extremity, especially the part below the ankle.

Concepts.definition: Being or located on or directed toward the side of the body to the east when facing north.
The structure found below the ankle joint.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Being or located on or directed toward the side of the body to the west when facing north.: The terminal part of the lower extremity, especially the part below the ankle.

Concepts.definition: Being or located on or directed toward the side of the body to the west when facing north.
The structure found below the ankle joint.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Being or located on or directed toward the side of the body to the east when facing north.: A gliding joint between the distal ends of the tibia and fibula and the proximal end of the talus.

Concepts.definition: Being or located on or directed toward the side of the body to the east when facing north.
A gliding joint between the distal ends of the tibia and fibula and the proximal end of the talus.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Being or located on or directed toward the side of the body to the west when facing north.: A gliding joint between the distal ends of the tibia and fibula and the proximal end of the talus.

Concepts.definition: Being or located on or directed toward the side of the body to the west when facing north.
A gliding joint between the distal ends of the tibia and fibula and the proximal end of the talus.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Being or located on or directed toward the side of the body to the east when facing north.: A hinge joint in the human leg connecting the tibia and fibula with the femur and protected in front by the patella.

Concepts.definition: Being or located on or directed toward the side of the body to the east when facing north.

A joint connecting the lower part of the femur with the upper part of the tibia. The lower part of the femur and the upper part of the tibia are attached to each other by ligaments. Other structures of the knee joint include the upper part of the fibula, located below and parallel to the tibia, and the patella which moves as the knee bends.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Being or located on or directed toward the side of the body to the west when facing north.: A hinge joint in the human leg connecting the tibia and fibula with the femur and protected in front by the patella.

Concepts.definition: Being or located on or directed toward the side of the body to the west when facing north.

A joint connecting the lower part of the femur with the upper part of the tibia. The lower part of the femur and the upper part of the tibia are attached to each other by ligaments. Other structures of the knee joint include the upper part of the fibula, located below and parallel to the tibia, and the patella which moves as the knee bends.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Being or located on or directed toward the side of the body to the east when facing north.: The lateral prominence of the pelvis from the waist to the thigh.

Concepts.definition: Being or located on or directed toward the side of the body to the east when facing north.
The lateral prominence of the pelvis from the waist to the thigh.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Being or located on or directed toward the side of the body to the west when facing north.: The lateral prominence of the pelvis from the waist to the thigh.

Concepts.definition: Being or located on or directed toward the side of the body to the west when facing north.
The lateral prominence of the pelvis from the waist to the thigh.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: locations or structures in the human body.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Definition not available.:Orthopedics is the branch of surgery broadly concerned with the skeletal system (bones and joints). (from On-line Medical Dictionary):Named locations of, or within, the body.

Concepts.definition: The limb that is composed of the hip, thigh, leg and foot.
The branch of surgery broadly concerned with the skeletal system (bones and joints).
Named locations of or within the body.
